languages.text: {n}В {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-канале звучит щелчок, а затем усталый вздох.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, подобные события — следствие ошибок в исчислениях {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитаторов{/g}, или же какой-то иной объяснимой причины... прошу вас, не уподобляйтесь тем, кто шепчется о том, что судно проклято или одержимо".

{n}A click comes through the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-channel followed by a weary sigh.{/n} "Lord Captain, occurrences such as these are caused by errors in {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} calculations or have some other sensible explanation... I beseech you not to take after those who whisper about the ship being cursed or possessed."
languages.original_text: {n}В {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-канале звучит щелчок, а затем усталый вздох.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, подобные события — следствие ошибок в исчислениях {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитаторов{/g}, или же какой-то иной объяснимой причины... прошу вас, не уподобляйтесь тем, кто шепчется о том, что судно проклято или одержимо".

I beseech you not to take after those who whisper about the ship being cursed or possessed."

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}频道中传来了咔哒声，随后是一声疲惫的叹息。{/n}“舰长大人，诸如此类的事故应该是由于{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}计算故障引起的，也可能有别的什么合理解释……有的船员说这艘船遭到了诅咒，或是被什么鬼怪附体之类的，我请求您不要听信那些谣传。”
languages.original_text: {n}A click comes through the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-channel followed by a weary sigh.{/n} "Lord Captain, occurrences such as these are caused by errors in {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} calculations or have some other sensible explanation... I beseech you not to take after those who whisper about the ship being cursed or possessed."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}频道中传来了咔哒声，随后是一声疲惫的叹息。{/n}“舰长大人，诸如此类的事故应该是由于{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}计算故障引起的，也可能有别的什么合理解释……有的船员说这艘船遭到了诅咒，或是被什么鬼怪附体之类的，我请求您不要听信那些谣传。”

languages.text: {n}Le canal-{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} produit un clic suivi d'un soupir las.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, de telles occurrences ont forcément une explication rationnelle, par exemple une erreur de calcul du {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g}. Je ne saurais que trop vous recommander de ne pas prêter attention à ces histoires de malédiction ou de vaisseau hanté. »
languages.original_text: {n}A click comes through the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-channel followed by a weary sigh.{/n} "Lord Captain, occurrences such as these are caused by errors in {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} calculations or have some other sensible explanation... I beseech you not to take after those who whisper about the ship being cursed or possessed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le canal-{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} produit un clic suivi d'un soupir las.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, de telles occurrences ont forcément une explication rationnelle, par exemple une erreur de calcul du {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g}. Je ne saurais que trop vous recommander de ne pas prêter attention à ces histoires de malédiction ou de vaisseau hanté. »

languages.text: {n}Un chasquido brota del canal de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}, seguido de un suspiro cansado.{/n} «Lord Capitán, esta clase de sucesos se deben a errores en los cálculos de un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} u otros sucesos explicables con lógica... Le ruego que no dé alas a aquellos que rumorean que la nave puede estar maldita o poseída».
languages.original_text: {n}A click comes through the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-channel followed by a weary sigh.{/n} "Lord Captain, occurrences such as these are caused by errors in {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} calculations or have some other sensible explanation... I beseech you not to take after those who whisper about the ship being cursed or possessed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un chasquido brota del canal de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}, seguido de un suspiro cansado.{/n} «Lord Capitán, esta clase de sucesos se deben a errores en los cálculos de un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} u otros sucesos explicables con lógica... Le ruego que no dé alas a aquellos que rumorean que la nave puede estar maldita o poseída».

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}通信を介してクリック音と、続いて疲れ切ったため息が聞こえてくる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、このような事件の原因については{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}の計算エラーか、もしくは他に道理にかなう説明ができるはずです…船が呪われたとか取りつかれたなどと噂する連中に追従しないよう頼みます」
languages.original_text: {n}A click comes through the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-channel followed by a weary sigh.{/n} "Lord Captain, occurrences such as these are caused by errors in {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} calculations or have some other sensible explanation... I beseech you not to take after those who whisper about the ship being cursed or possessed."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}通信を介してクリック音と、続いて疲れ切ったため息が聞こえてくる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、このような事件の原因については{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}の計算エラーか、もしくは他に道理にかなう説明ができるはずです…船が呪われたとか取りつかれたなどと噂する連中に追従しないよう頼みます」

languages.text: {n}Ein Klick ertönt aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Kanal, gefolgt von einem erschöpften Seufzen.{/n} "Lord Captain, solche Vorkommnisse entstehen durch Fehler in den {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g}-Berechnungen oder haben eine andere vernünftige Erklärung ... Ich bitte Euch, fallt nicht auf jene herein, die behaupten, das Schiff sei verflucht oder besessen."
languages.original_text: {n}A click comes through the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-channel followed by a weary sigh.{/n} "Lord Captain, occurrences such as these are caused by errors in {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} calculations or have some other sensible explanation... I beseech you not to take after those who whisper about the ship being cursed or possessed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Klick ertönt aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Kanal, befolgt von einem erschöpften Seufzen.{/n} "Lord Captain, solche Vorkommnisse entstehen durch Fehler in den {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g}-Berechnungen oder haben eine andere vernünftige Erklärung ... Ich bitte Euch, fallt nicht auf jene herein, die behaupten, das Schiff sei verflucht oder besessen."

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks{/g} kanalından bir tıkırtı gelip onu bitkin bir iç çekiş takip ediyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan... Bu tip durumlar, {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayar{/g} hesaplamalarındaki hatalardan kaynaklı olur veya başka bir mantıklı açıklama mutlaka vardır. Geminin lanetli olduğuna veya bazı varlıklarının gemiyi ele geçirdiğine dair söylentilere kulak asmamanızı rica ederim."
languages.original_text: {n}A click comes through the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-channel followed by a weary sigh.{/n} "Lord Captain, occurrences such as these are caused by errors in {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} calculations or have some other sensible explanation... I beseech you not to take after those who whisper about the ship being cursed or possessed."
